com.communote.server.api.core.config

Interface ConfigurationManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationPropertiesManager

    public interface ConfigurationManager
    Manager for accessing and updating configuration
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deactivateDefaultBlog()
      Deactivates the default blog of the current client.
      ApplicationConfigurationProperties getApplicationConfigurationProperties()
      Returns the current application properties.
      ApplicationConfigurationProperties getApplicationConfigurationProperties(boolean forceCacheInvalidation)
      Returns the current application properties.
      ClientConfigurationProperties getClientConfigurationProperties()
      Returns the client configuration properties of the current client.
      DatabaseConfiguration getDatabaseConfiguration()
      Return the DatabaseConfiguration that is created by a DatabaseConfigurationFactory.
      DevelopmentProperties getDevelopmentProperties()
      Returns the development properties of the running instance.
      StartupProperties getStartupProperties()
      Returns the startup properties.
      void setDatabaseConfigurationFactory(DatabaseConfigurationFactory databaseConfigurationFactory)
      Set the factory for creating the database configuration when getDatabaseConfiguration() is called.
      void setDefaultBlog(Blog blog)
      Activates the default blog of the current client.
      void setPrimaryAuthentication(String externalSystemId, boolean allowDBAuth)

      Updates a collection of application configuration properties.

      Updates a collection of client configuration properties.

      Updates a client configuration properties.

      Update the client timezone and reload the cache.

      Update the Confluence authentication and reload the cache.

      Update the startup properties.

    • Method Detail

      • deactivateDefaultBlog

        void deactivateDefaultBlog()
        Deactivates the default blog of the current client.

      • getApplicationConfigurationProperties

        ApplicationConfigurationProperties getApplicationConfigurationProperties()
        Returns the current application properties.
        Returns:
        the application properties

      • getApplicationConfigurationProperties

        ApplicationConfigurationProperties getApplicationConfigurationProperties(boolean forceCacheInvalidation)
        Returns the current application properties.
        Parameters:
        forceCacheInvalidation - true if the cache should be invalidated before fetching
        Returns:
        the application properties

      • getClientConfigurationProperties

        ClientConfigurationProperties getClientConfigurationProperties()
        Returns the client configuration properties of the current client.
        Returns:
        the client configuration properties

      • getDatabaseConfiguration

        DatabaseConfiguration getDatabaseConfiguration()
        Return the DatabaseConfiguration that is created by a DatabaseConfigurationFactory. If no factory was set with setDatabaseConfigurationFactory(DatabaseConfigurationFactory) null will be returned. The configuration will only created once if this method is called after the installation has been completed.
        Returns:
        the DatabaseConfiguration to use

      • getDevelopmentProperties

        DevelopmentProperties getDevelopmentProperties()
        Returns the development properties of the running instance.
        Returns:
        the development properties

      • getStartupProperties

        StartupProperties getStartupProperties()
        Returns the startup properties.
        Returns:
        the startup properties

      • setDatabaseConfigurationFactory

        void setDatabaseConfigurationFactory(DatabaseConfigurationFactory databaseConfigurationFactory)
        Set the factory for creating the database configuration when getDatabaseConfiguration() is called.
        Parameters:
        databaseConfigurationFactory - the database configuration factory to use

      • setDefaultBlog

        void setDefaultBlog(Blog blog)
        Activates the default blog of the current client.
        Parameters:
        blog - The default blog.

      • setPrimaryAuthentication

        void setPrimaryAuthentication(String externalSystemId,
                              boolean allowDBAuth)
                       throws PrimaryAuthenticationException
        Parameters:
        externalSystemId - The id of the external system. If this is null, the current authentication method will be removed.
        allowDBAuth - True, if internal database authentication is allowed.
        Throws:
        PrimaryAuthenticationException - Exception.

      • updateApplicationConfigurationProperties

        void updateApplicationConfigurationProperties(Map<ApplicationConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
                                       throws ConfigurationUpdateException
        Updates a collection of application configuration properties.
        Parameters:
        settings - a mapping of the properties to their new value
        Throws:
        ConfigurationUpdateException - exception.

      • updateClientConfigurationProperties

        void updateClientConfigurationProperties(Map<ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
        Updates a collection of client configuration properties.
        Parameters:
        settings - a mapping of the properties to their new value

      • updateClientConfigurationProperty

        void updateClientConfigurationProperty(ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant key,
                                       String value)
        Updates a client configuration properties.
        Parameters:
        key - the property to update
        value - the new value

      • updateClientTimeZone

        void updateClientTimeZone(String timeZoneId)
        Update the client timezone and reload the cache.
        Forwards to ConfigurationManagement.updateClientTimeZoneId(String)
        Parameters:
        timeZoneId - the new timezoneId

      • updateConfluenceConfig

        void updateConfluenceConfig(ConfluenceConfiguration confluenceAuthConfig)
                     throws EncryptionException,
                            AuthorizationException,
                            PrimaryAuthenticationException
        Update the Confluence authentication and reload the cache. Forwards to ConfigurationManagement.updateConfluenceAuthConfig(ConfluenceConfiguration)
        Parameters:
        confluenceAuthConfig - the config
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager
        EncryptionException - in case of an encryption exception
        PrimaryAuthenticationException - Exception.

      • updateLdapConfiguration

        void updateLdapConfiguration(LdapConfiguration ldapConfig)
                      throws AuthorizationException,
                             EncryptionException,
                             PrimaryAuthenticationException
        Update the LDAP authentication and reload the cache.
        Forwards to ConfigurationManagement.updateLdapConfiguration(LdapConfiguration)
        Parameters:
        ldapConfig - the config
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager
        EncryptionException - in case of an encryption exception
        PrimaryAuthenticationException - Exception.

      • updateStartupProperties

        void updateStartupProperties(Map<CoreConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
                      throws ConfigurationUpdateException
        Update the startup properties.
        Parameters:
        settings - mapping with the new values to be set.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationUpdateException - in case the update failed

      • updateStartupProperty

        void updateStartupProperty(CoreConfigurationPropertyConstant property,
                           String value)
                    throws ConfigurationUpdateException
        Updates a startup property.
        Parameters:
        property - the property to update
        value - the new value
        Throws:
        ConfigurationUpdateException - in case the update failed
